mulinma, parajitha mahinda rajapakshata kurunagalin apekshakathwaya laba dimedith, janathawa wisin mathiwaranayen parajayata pathkarana laduwa atharamanwa siti deshapalana anathayanta kabinat amathi dhura pirinamimedith, allas komisame adhyaksha jenaralwariyawa panna damimedith, gotabhaya rajapaksha athulu hitapu hamuda nayakayan kihipa deneku aka‡∑äramikatha sambandhayen adhikaranaya idiriyata kandawu awasthawe owunge aarakshawa wenuwen idiripath wimedith, sajin was gunawardhana saha mahindananda aluthgamage wani boho deshapalagnyayanta erehiwa nithiya ka‡∑äriyathmaka kirima walakwimedith, shishyayan 11 deneku paharagena yama sambandhayen hitapu nawuka hamudapathi rawi wijegunawardhanata erehiwa nithiya ka‡∑äriyathmaka kirima walakwimedith, (layisthuwa thawa boho digaya) me janadhipathiwaraya gana agamathiwaraya ho eksath jathika pakshaya katak ara wachanayak kiwe natha.

shri lanka manawa himikam komishan sabhawata aarakshaka amathyanshaya wisin adala sebalunge nam idiripath kala wita sahathika pathraya laba dima ekawara kala nohaki bawath mema sebalun yuda samaye manawa himikam ullanghanaya kirime katayuthuwalata sambandha wi thibedayi pariksha kala yuthu bawath komishan sabhawa rajayata danum di atha.ese kiya manawa himikam parikshakayan pirisak lawa adala sebalun gana parikshanayak aarambha kala bawa dana gannata thibe.ema manawa himikam parikshakayan yataki parikshanaya sithamathama sahena kalayak thisse pama kirima hethuwen meratin sama sadhaka hamudawata sebalun bandawa ganima sandaha laba di thibu awasan dinaya ikuth wi giyeya .ema nisa ape rana wiruwanta eksath jathinge sama sadhaka hamudawata bandi ihala watula watupak laba ganimata thibu awasthawa ahimiwiya .eya thamange manawa himikam ullanghanaya kirimak bawa me gana apa wetha karunu dak wu hamuda sebalun kihipa denek sandahan karanu labuha.
me sandaha welasanin ayadum kala yuthuya.
